9f269388-cf7c-4e50-9b99-e7cafa61ed37.description: Upon completing this program, the earner will be comfortable developing Business Intelligence applications with Microsoft SQL using SSIS, SSRS and SSAS services, and demonstrate the ability to conduct statistical analyses using Excel, interpret descriptive and inferential statistics, and explore relationships among variables.
9f269388-cf7c-4e50-9b99-e7cafa61ed37.name: Data Analytics

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Colaberry Data Analytics instructor-led online or remote program

018be130-848e-4523-9a3e-0bc277ca8c98.description: Upon completing the workshop, the earner gains an understanding of reinforcement learning and experience in developing and training their own algorithms in a collaborative environment. The AWS DeepRacer Workshop provides hands-on learning experience through building, training, and evaluating your own reinforcement learning model that you can enter into a virtual or physical circuit of the AWS DeepRacer League.
018be130-848e-4523-9a3e-0bc277ca8c98.name: AWS DeepRacer Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: AWS DeepRacer Workshop and Race
Refactored AWS DeepRacer Course

7a51820f-dc5f-4561-8412-d3e5179c0cc3.description: The Colaberry mentorship program consists of industry-seasoned graduates of our data science and analytics programs who provide guidance, support, and expertise to Colaberry learners and the Colaberry community at large.
7a51820f-dc5f-4561-8412-d3e5179c0cc3.name: Mentor Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Actively mentor Colaberry learners during their training and job search phases.
Member of the Colaberry Leaders and Mentors community.
Industry experience in the field of data analytics and/or data science.

skills.name: Analyzing KPIs To Make Business Decisions

d7965678-1ff8-419b-925c-d2cb64bc5183.description: The Power BI Certification validates the skills and knowledge necessary to be proficient in connecting to data sources and performing data transformations, modeling and visualizing data by using Microsoft Power BI Desktop and configuring dashboards by using the Power BI service. The earner of the badge demonstrate implementing direct connectivity to Microsoft SQL Azure and SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS), and implementing data analysis in Microsoft Excel.
d7965678-1ff8-419b-925c-d2cb64bc5183.name: Power BI Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Consume and transform data by using Power BI Desktop
Model and visualize data
Configure dashboards in the Power BI Service

f9bab0d0-db24-468f-a675-04867241e377.description: Earner will learn the essentials of Python for Data Science.
f9bab0d0-db24-468f-a675-04867241e377.name: Data Science I - Python Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Python for Data Scientists - Python Data Handling

skills.name: Manipulating and Analyzing Data in Pandas DataFrames

a8402514-df57-48c7-acf5-0773e4c843a8.description: The course curriculum provides participants with high-level understanding of data science and the ‘art of the possible.’ It consists of two modules that introduce programming for data science and build data literacy. The course provides a strong foundation for understanding, applying and interpreting machine learning models.
a8402514-df57-48c7-acf5-0773e4c843a8.name: CARE Data Science-I

badge_template_activities.title: The course consists of Module I: Python for Data Scientists, and Module II: Data Handling. It provides training in Python programming language and its application to perform data analysis. It also covers various types and formats of data, data modeling and SQL through Python. Learners work with small datasets and Python packages, and will develop in-depth understanding of how to pre-process and prepare data for statistical and machine learning modeling.

a4e04a68-c213-424e-bd4c-914d2305fed4.description: Colaberry Certified Data Analytics Instructors are qualified to teach Colaberry data analytics courses. They demonstrate technical skills as well as teaching capabilities, including managing course timing, facilitating student exercises, and technical discussions. These instructors are current on data analytics technology and meet the highest standards of technical knowledge and presentation skills.
a4e04a68-c213-424e-bd4c-914d2305fed4.name: Data Analytics Instructor

badge_template_activities.title: Data Analytics
Mentor Certification
Taught four or more Colaberry data analytics courses as a Teaching Assistant.

2e8ff3bd-3d54-4106-b087-da28b0c25d89.description: Data Talent Showcase is a monthly, live, virtual event to meet Colaberry School’s latest cohort of Data Analysts/Scientists who have been developing their skills through Training Programs. Participants showcase their innovative projects, respond to questions from industry experts and use them to enhance their projects.
2e8ff3bd-3d54-4106-b087-da28b0c25d89.name: Data Talent Showcase - Winner

badge_template_activities.title: The Colaberry learner must have participated in the CAP competition and be selected for the Data Talent Showcase. Prepare and demonstrate understanding of Data Analysis and visualization for the selected project. Communicate the project and recommendations in a succinct manner. Answer questions posed by the audience and subject-matter-expert judges

7c39cf2b-7961-492f-aab1-385d215844d9.description: Earners of this badge will be able to clean, sterilize, and assemble surgical instruments, equipment, and supplies for use in operating rooms and other medical and surgical facilities. Graduates will also be skilled in infection control, decontamination, surgical instrumentation processing, distribution, and record-keeping.
7c39cf2b-7961-492f-aab1-385d215844d9.name: Sterilization Technician

4a849f0c-c7b3-4d18-9b4d-880b0dc8d8e7.description: The earner understands how to manipulate, visualize and analyze data. The individual is also able to apply machine learning algorithms on small and big data sets, and use Jupyter notebooks and other open-source Data Science tools.

6f6ee527-faa8-4866-9721-4cabb8de4ff1.description: Data Science - III allows learners to dive deep into advanced regression, classification, and clustering models.
6f6ee527-faa8-4866-9721-4cabb8de4ff1.name: Data Science III - Machine Learning Algorithms

badge_template_activities.title: Bias Variance Tradeoff and Regularization - SVMs and Kernel Tricks - Decision Trees for Prediction - Random Forests - Advanced Tree Algorithms - Unsupervised Learning and K-means Clustering - DBScan and Dimensionality Reduction - Hierarchical Clustering

c554e33c-5289-498c-aa50-031dc7baf04b.description: The earner understands the basic foundations of Machine Learning, with extended knowledge in Math & Statistics, Regression, and Classification models.
c554e33c-5289-498c-aa50-031dc7baf04b.name: Data Science II - Foundations of Machine Learning

badge_template_activities.title: Linear Algebra - Introduction to Statistics and Probability - Distributions and Associated Statistics - Statistics Revisited - Linear Regression Models - Model Selection and Polynomial Regression - Classification and Logistic Regression - Classification - Naive Bayes

39367359-596c-4aff-b21b-96084abcae40.description: As an earner of this badge, the learner will be able to Identify prospective customers by using business directories, following leads from existing clients, and participating in organizations and clubs. They will be able to plan, assemble, and stock product displays, promotional programs, and advertising. They will be able to contact regular and prospective customers to demonstrate products, explain product features, and solicit orders.

2c3147b4-9469-4e5f-ad2f-79323e95a597.description: The earner of this badge has learned the Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) process, applied it to real datasets, and understands how data is stored in relational and non-relational databases. The earner is able to query and modify databases and organize data into well-structured and easily retrievable formats.

ec86dd56-c66d-42cd-b33e-63d5bf568a1e.description: This Professional Communication badge is awarded to participants of the RetailPays program conducted in collaboration with MNK Infotech and Workforce Solutions - Greater Dallas. The goal of the Retailpays program is to help entry-level workers navigate retail career pathways that lead to mid-level careers by enabling online educations for learners.
